controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Game controller manages the logic of the game. It creates the other three controllers and contains the methods to access them. It is also responsible for out of game functions such as: saving and loading, profile manipulation, Leaderboard creation and player rendering

    • Method Detail

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Restarts the game from the last loaded file - if save is loaded it will restart from the saved location and not the level itsefl.

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame(java.lang.String path)
        Loads a path to a map file and to generate objects for use in the game. Initialises the controllers and handles the map specifics.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the map file.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(java.lang.String saveName)
        Method to return a new savefile. Gets all controllers exports and writes them all to one file including the current time spent on the level.
        Parameters:
        saveName - path to save data to

      • setProfile

        public void setProfile(Profile p)
        Method which sets the profile being used and also proceeds to the next stage after profile selection which is the level selection.
        Parameters:
        p - The profile object being used for the game.

      • createProfile

        public void createProfile()
        Method to change the selectProfileMenu to the createProfileMenu.

      • loadSaves

        public void loadSaves()
        This method loads the levelMenu with all the saves under the current profile.

      • toLevelSelect

        public void toLevelSelect()
        Toggles the leaderboardMenu then loads the levels up to the profiles maximum level and toggles the levelMenu itself.

      • currentTimeMillis

        public static int currentTimeMillis()
        Converts current system time to Integer
        Returns:
        The System time converted to an integer.

        public void nextLevel()
        Toggles the leaderboardMenu and loads the next level.

      • gameStep

        public void gameStep(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
        Progresses the game 1 step and handles the key pressed.
        Parameters:
        e - Key Event that was pressed by the user.

      • addTime

        public void addTime(double time)
        Adds the time to the leaderboard file for the level
        Parameters:
        time - The time in seconds

      • getLeaderboard

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLeaderboard()
        Shows a leaderboard for a specific map in LEADERBOARD_DIR.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the strings inside the Leaderboard file

      • addMapTime

        public void addMapTime(java.lang.String path)

        Parameters:
        path - THe file path for the map.

      • render

        public void render()
        Initial render method to display the map and orient it to the player start position

      • renderPlayer

        public void renderPlayer()
        Changes the position of the map under the player level based on the players location. Calculate half the width of the Players GridPane and then translate the map and Entity GridPane the x and y value of the "offset".
